CSImageViewer Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
ColorImageDataClass containing the actual pixel data for a color image (3 values per pixel - red, green, and blue (rgb))
CSImageViewerInstantiate this class to display an image. v4.1 adds support for drag-and-drop of input files
GrayImageDataClass containing the actual pixel data for a gray image (one value per pixel)
ImageDataClass containing the actual pixel data values (note that this class is abstract)
MainProgramThis class contains the Main() method
pnmHelperThis class contains methods that read and write PNM/PGM/PPM images (color rgb and grey images)
TimerClass containing timer (elapsed time) implementation. this class may be used to determine the elapsed time of a processing activity. timer resolution is milliseconds
